short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Google Chrome extension to provide a 'scratchpad' for notes on the 'New Tab' page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension will replace your "New Tab" page with TabPad.

TabPad will provide you with a writing interface that will let you write anything you want in the TabPad interface and will store all of your content locally.

None of the information you type in TabPad will ever be sent to any remote third-party location.
